recipeInstructions.text:
Brown a slab of bacon on all
sides; remove with a slotted spoon.
Add chopped onion, carrot and
celery, and cook until onion is soft.
Add red wine, and boil out a bit;
add stock and bacon; cover and
simmer until very tender. Remove
the bacon, pat dry and sear it in a
skillet or on the grill. Slice and
serve with reduced braising liquid.
Garnish: Thyme or parsley.
